specifications.Fiber Content: Wool 47% / Acrylic 22% / Polyester 13% / Silk 5% / Nylon 5% / Linen 5% / Modal 3%
specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric. Yarn Effect > Boucle Bouclé is a fabric characterized by its looped, knotted, or curled texture on the surface. It can be made from various materials, not just wool, and these unique loops give the fabric a warm feel and a rich, dimensional appearance.
specifications.Care Advice: Natural > Plant > Linen Linen fabric is made from natural materials, so it may have small bumps (slubs) in it. It is also important to keep linen fabric dry, because it can shrink or become misshapen if it gets wet. Store linen fabric in a cool, dry place where it can get plenty of air. Natural > Silk Silk can be damaged by sweat and other acidic substances. It may also fade if left in the sun for too long. Store it in a place without direct sunlight. Regenerated > Modal This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location. Yarn Effect > Boucle Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Sustainability Eco-forward > Dead Stock This fabric is deadstock (leftover from previous productions) and will not be restocked after selling out. Brand Yarn Woolmark® machine washable Clothes carrying the Woolmark-approved Machine Washable label can be safely machine washed in a washing machine multiple times, without shrinkage taking place. Recommended Use Coats
